# PED::SET_PED_CAN_PLAY_IN_CAR_IDLES

## Summary
Enable or disable in-car idle animations

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** val

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Toggles config flag CPED_CONFIG_FLAG_CanPlayInCarIdles.
